description.value: You heard the call of the sea from a young age. Maybe you signed onto a merchant's vessel, joined the navy, or even fell in with a crew of pirates and scalawags. Life at sea taught you to work as part of a crew and stay steady when solid ground is just a memory. You might be on land now, but the ocean never really lets go of those who've sailed her waters. Skills: Athletics 2, Acrobatics 2, Perception 1, Wilderness 1, +40 XP Equipment: Lime bast rope, common clothes, belt knife, shoes Feature - Ship Passage: You can secure free or reduced passage on ships and are welcomed in port taverns. Sailors recognize and trust one of their own.
